articles.title: U.S. and EU flesh out trade commitments under new framework deal. Here's what is in the pact. - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. and European Union said they have formalized a deal aimed at rebalancing their trade relationship.
articles.content:
The U.S. will impose a 15% tariff on imports of European cars, pharmaceuticals and other products, according to a joint statement issued Thursday by the Trump administration and European Union.
